Clockwork_Army.help: You teleport up to three Clockwork to your location to provide support in battle situations.

Repair.help: You adjust the plasma stream of your beam rifle to release a nanite infused beam that will restore the health of a single damaged pet.

messages.attackerHit: You heal {PlayerDest} with {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage.

Single_Shot.help: You fire a single blast from your beam rifle, causing energy damage and lowering your target's regeneration rate. There is also a chance that you will knock your target down.
Single_Shot.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DMG (Energy), -Regen (Foe) Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Charged_Shot.help: You charge up your beam rifle and fire a concentrated blast of energy at a single target. This causes energy damage and lowers your target's recovery. There is also a chance that your target may be knocked down.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Cutting_Beam.help: You fire a constant stream of energy from your weapon, sweeping it in a broad arc to blast all foes in a wide cone in front of you. This causes energy damage and lowers the defense of affected targets. There is a chance that your target will continue to suffer energy damage briefly after the initial burst of energy damage.
Cutting_Beam.shortHelp: Ranged (Cone), High DMG(Energy), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Moderate DoT (Energy)
Cutting_Beam.targetHelp: Your defenses have been reduced. There is a chance you may also be suffering energy damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.

Piercing_Beam.help: You fire a supercharged beam of energy in a narrow cone that pierces up to 3 enemies. Each affected enemy suffers energy damage and reduced resistance to all forms of damage. There is also a chance that there is an additional burst of energy that causes extra energy damage on a target.
Piercing_Beam.shortHelp: Ranged (Narrow Cone), Superior DMG (Energy), -RES (Foe, All), Chance for Moderate DMG (Energy)
Piercing_Beam.targetHelp: Your resistance to all forms of damage has been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Overcharged_Beam.help: You overcharge your beam rifle, releasing the accumulated power in a massive blast of energy targeted at your foes. This blast erupts on hitting the target, causing energy damage and significantly lowering the defenses of all foes caught in the burst. There is also a lingering damage over time effect, but this is much less powerful than the initial burst. Additionally, there is a strong chance that affected targets will be stunned.
Overcharged_Beam.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Extreme DMG(Energy), Minor DoT (Energy), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Stun (Foe)
Overcharged_Beam.targetHelp: Your defenses have been reduced. There is a chance you may also be stunned.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
